entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.7°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 3.7°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
